mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipe (recipe_title, recipe_content, user_nickname, recipe_realname, recipe_filename, file_path, user_num) VALUES (#{recipe_title}, #{recipe_content}, #{user_nickname}, #{recipe_realname}, #{recipe_filename}, #{file_path}, #{user_num} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM recipe ORDER BY insert_date DESC
SELECT * FROM recipe ORDER BY good_count DESC
SELECT * FROM recipe ORDER BY view_count DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE recipe SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE recipe_num = #{recipe_num}
UPDATE recipe SET view_count = view_count - 1 WHERE recipe_num = #{recipe_num}
UPDATE recipe SET good_count = good_count + 1 WHERE recipe_num = #{recipe_num}
UPDATE recipe SET good_count = good_count - 1 WHERE recipe_num = #{recipe_num}
UPDATE recipe SET comment_count = comment_count + 1 WHERE recipe_num = #{recipe_num}
UPDATE recipe SET comment_count = comment_count - 1 WHERE recipe_num = #{recipe_num}
